entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 07:18 AM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 07:18 AM EST Monday 09 January 2023
